original_title: The Rockford Files: Shoot-Out at the Golden Pagoda
overview: After a quiet fishing trip, Rockford is tricked into taking over a fellow PI's case involving alleged Police misconduct, which lands him in the hospital, hounded by a beautiful reporter, and out of favor with the entire Police Deapartment. Meanwhile Angel tries to cash in on the publicity by selling a movie about Rockford's life.
title: The Rockford Files: Shoot-Out at the Golden Pagoda
